short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tiny vulnerability scanner based on vulners.com vulnerability database. Passively scan websites while you surf internet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tiny vulnerability security scanner based on vulners.com vulnerability database.
It provides you ability to passively scan websites that you surf, on known vulnerabilities. 

#security #scanner #vulners #vulnerability #web #threat
